name: My Spotify Stats
description: This project is a useful tool for seeing the spotify user top listened to tracks, artists and recently played songs.

name: Project Dashboard
description: This project is dashboard and home of analysts for any project created by Michael Beaseley. Will display graphical charts relate code smell and much more.

name: CCDesign Web Component Library
description: This project is my second actual live project in production and my first live NPM package. Purpose of this component library was to improve performance and simplify my Angular 8 website. Easy area on ccdesign.me.uk is comprised of this Web Component Library, from the carsouel to the copy.

name: Personal Website
description: This project is the first actual live project in production to be viewed. Purpose of my personal website is to act like a CV and a promotion for all further projects created by myself. This project has been through a evolution, using different libraries and packages.

name: University Final Year Project
description: My final year project at Brunel University was title 'Using Smartphone technology to simulate human behaviour within an indoor environment'.
